name: every-island
description: Ania's big dream is to collect postcards from every island in the world (at least those that have a postbox).

scripts.start: echo 'You may be interested in `npm run-script build` or `npm run-script dev`.'
scripts.styles: npm run-script styles/build && npm run-script styles/inline
scripts.build: npm run-script styles && npm run-script copy-template
scripts.dev: npm run-script styles/watch & browser-sync start --files="style/*.css, *.html" --server --index preview.html

author: Marek ‘saji’ Augustynowicz
